name: Gravity's End
description:
Your mission: retrieve the energy core at Gravity's End and return it to the drop point. Are you up for the challenge?

A game made for Metroidvania Month 19

Controls
  • WASD: Movement
  • Space: Jump/Dash
  • Mouse: look/aim
  • Left Mouse: shoot
  • Right Mouse: Cycle active weapon
Credits
  • Adroit Conceptions: Programming, Gameplay, 3D Modelling, Level design
  • Wayfarer Games: UI

Sounds from:

  • Unity Asset Store Assets: MaGuns, Free Laser Weapons, Sci-fi Guns SFX Pack, Footsteps - Essentials
  • Wowie Resources

Icons from https://game-icons.net

  • https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/plasma-bolt.html by Lorc
  • https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/ice-bolt.html by Lorc
  • https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/rocket.html by Lorc
